title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
desc: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
org: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

records.QueryText: farmer want to know information about seed treatment of gram?
records.KccAns: recommended for   seed treatment of gram treat the seed with tricoderma viridi 5gm/kg of seed or thiram 3gm/kg of seed

records.QueryText: ASKING FOR PREDICTED WEATHER UPTO 5TH MARCH
records.KccAns: Clear to partial cloudy sky with 0-1 octa will prevail during next 5 days. 4 mm rainfall is predicted on 5th March, 2017. Mainly South-Easterly wind with a speed of 3.0-4.0 kmph is expected. Maximum temperature is predicted as 26.0, 26.0, 26.0, 26.0 and 26.0°C and minimum as 12.0, 13.0, 14.0, 13.0 and 15.0°C on 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th and 5th March 2017 respectively. Morning and evening relative humidity will be around 69-88% and 31-35% during next 5 days.
NO RAIN POSSIBILITY IN NEXT 5 DAYS BUT CLOUDY SKY
